website_summaries.verdict: Overall, it's a good changing pad, but others on our list deliver similar quality and performance at a more reasonable price.
pros: Well-padded and comfortable with an internal posture support board for extra stability
Generous size with room for growth
GREENGUARD tested and certified for low chemical emissions
Cleans easily with soap and water
cons: May not fit on smaller surfaces
More expensive than similar changing pads

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Made with polyurethane which is toxic for babies!!!! Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Urs

customer_reviews.title: CONTAINS URETHANE FOAM
customer_reviews.text: Just received this item...and looked at the attached label which reads: CONTENT: 69% FIBERBOARD, 31% URETHANE FOAM...not what I want my grandchild on! Search on the internet for "Best Organic Crib Mattress by Healthy Child"...great article about the many chemicals used in mattress and pad manufacturing...opened my eyes that there are layers of certification...and Greenguard is just a start...there are many certifications and they all mean something different...be informed!!
customer_reviews.author: Been Around

customer_reviews.title: Good Changing Pad
customer_reviews.text: I retuned my previous Summer Infant changing pad because it had an awful burnt chemical smell that got worse everyday. It actually stunk up our entire upstairs, which is 5 rooms. I couldn't imagine keeping that locked up in our poor baby's room. This Colgate pad has absolutely no odor, and it didn't even fresh out of the box. Our changing pad cover fits over it great. Looking forward to using it for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the "DaVinvci Jayden 3 Drawer Changer Dresser" and it's perfect. It has a little space between the edges. I love that it has the water proofing cover per-se over it so if an accident or a blowout happens I don't have to worry about any fabric being ruined on the changing pad, and I just have to change the sheet. The safety buckle is a nice edition even though my changing table came with it's own. I should also note that I was happy with the packaging! It comes pre-packaged and not packed by Amazon so it can't be tampered with or altered in anyway before delivery.
customer_reviews.author: SamanthaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Good pad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: So we purchased this changing pad as an extra to leave at our family’s vacation house. It’s definitely not as nice as our more expensive Colgate changing pad that we have in our house. I’ve given it four stars because while it’s thinner than our nicer Colgate pad and also has a cheaper plasticky like cover, it’s a great pad for the price. Still a waterproof cover, plenty of padding for comfort, and a good size. I’d recommend it as a secondary pad.
customer_reviews.author: k-girl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful changing pad!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful changing pad and it is so nice that you can attach it to a table or dresser and not have to bother with some of the other box-style changing tops. My little one is long and big, so the generous size of this pad has been wonderful compared to others I've seen. It wipes clean easily and I would recommend it, despite the slightly higher price tag than some other brands. My first shipment didn't include the screws, so they free 2-day shipped me a new box and free returned my existing one. GREAT service!
customer_reviews.author: Jes W. S.

customer_reviews.title: Not 33 inches long
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this changing pad. It’s sturdy and it’s not cheap made, however it’s NOT 33 inches long. I’m so disappointed because I was looking for something longer than 32” since my baby keeps on hitting his feet on the changing table. I’ll keep it but I think they should not advertise it as 33 inches when in reality is 32 inches long.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Changing Pad
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made pad. Because it is curved on each side it keeps the baby in the center. Padding is nice and thick too. The strap helps you tie it down on the changing table and they provide two screws to make sure it doesn't come loose.
customer_reviews.author: F. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace a pad I bought for my youngest over a year ago, I believe the old one was a summer infant brand and it was thinner so I decided to spend more to get a nicer cushion. This was more than twice the price and seems to be same quality maybe a little better. It’s ok for a changing pad, just think it’s way overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Naja

customer_reviews.title: Baby (4mo) seems to like it well enough
customer_reviews.text: Baby (4mo) seems to like it well enough; my only complaint is that the strap seems like it could be improved--we mounted this on top of the dresser we use as a changing table, and didn't use the strap to buckle in the baby until she was old enough to need it; so it just was kind of in the way until then, with no place to tuck it or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Wickman

customer_reviews.title: Feels solid, no plastic odor
customer_reviews.text: Decided to order this changing pad even though it was sort of middle of the road in price, because I thought the ones I saw in person in Target looked kinda flimsy and unsubstantial. This one has a better weight to it, and sits securely down on top of bureau. I also read that some other ones had a very strong plastic odor, so I was pleased that this one doesn’t. Generic cover fits it, and hasn’t been any trouble to clean so far. Baby is pretty content to chill on it when I need a quick spot to set her down
customer_reviews.author: Amber Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Length.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived very dirty, in the package. Like it had been dragged across a dirty ground. I love the longer length of this pad and the materials it’s made with, it’s just that the poor condition of the pad when it arrived was very inconvenient. We got another that’s great, but I hope there’s more quality control going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Wamy

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big
customer_reviews.text: I cut the straps off because they were driving me crazy. Nice and big. Easy to clean. It is a little long for the sheet I got at target so it kind of bows it up in the middle until the sheet stretches out some. Would buy again though
customer_reviews.author: lovesweetlove04

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, durable and good product
customer_reviews.text: I like how it doesn't have all the toxic chemicals such a formaldehyde that you find in all baby products now a days. It's sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Nice changing pad
customer_reviews.text: Nice changing pad, as described in listing. I have only had it week or so, not sure how sure how durable the plastic cover will be sometime those will crack over time. Seems good so far
customer_reviews.author: MEW

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected Plus
customer_reviews.text: No clue how I got this product, but happy we got it. A second, portable changing pad that is not easy for him to roll off was an unknown must. Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last through one child.
customer_reviews.text: Had this lasted through even one child, I would have given it five stars. It is nicely padded and I like the contour of the pad. The problem is that my son wasn't even 16 months old before it started to tear in the center of the pad. Having the pad ripped, especially right in the area where the diaper is put on is not sanitary...now I need to buy another one. If this was a $10 pad, that would be ok but for the price, it should last through at least one child. I won't buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Manning

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and better price
customer_reviews.text: This changing pad is great, I did not want to spend a lot of money on a changing pad specially because we only use this briefly to changed a diaper. After looking around and reading many reviews I decided to give this a try and I’m glad I did. It’s very easy to clean and it’s confortablw for my little one.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I love the contour, it makes it harder for your baby to roll around. Wipes clean really easily and has a nice cushion to it.
customer_reviews.author: Diva

customer_reviews.title: It is great quality at a very fair price
customer_reviews.text: This changing pad was just what I needed to put on top of a chest of drawers when my grandson comes to my house. It is great quality at a very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Woods

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: We've owned two if these and both have split down the middle. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: J Do

customer_reviews.title: Works For Us
customer_reviews.text: This has been working great for us in our daughter's nursery. We have a nice minky cover to go over it so baby doesn't have to lay right on the plastic. It wipes up nice when she pees through the cover (as she's done a few times now) and it fits great on top of her dresser. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Organic Diva

customer_reviews.title: Easy, inexpensive and does what it needs to
customer_reviews.text: Don’t need to read too much into buying a changing pad. This one does the job. It’s perfectly fine and has the strap you will need.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy for 17mo- Made Well- Fits Universal Covers
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed by how sturdy this is since we have it on a tall chest of drawers and both sides lean off a bit. All covers for our old pad fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great but never used it, maybe once or twice, I change my baby on our high bed.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Fit the top of the dresser/changing table I rebuilt for ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit the top of the dresser/changing table I rebuilt for my son and daughter in law expecting their first baby.
customer_reviews.author: Wildcat Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Nice size.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size. The sides come up higher then some others.
customer_reviews.author: C Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: We were very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: I am the director of a child care center and we ordered this changing table pad for our infant room. It has already ripped, so we are having to replace it. We were very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this changing pad! Super easy to get cover on and off of. Comfortable for baby. Fits on the changing table perfect.
customer_reviews.author: J Zilinski

customer_reviews.title: Great for those wiggle worms!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my new grandson. This really helps with an active baby who is determined to control the changing experience. This is something I will buy again and again as a baby gift!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Greenguard certified!
customer_reviews.text: I am wondering if this is actually greenguard certified as the description states. I just received the changing pad and there is nothing in the packaging to indicate that it is actually greenguard certified. Other than that it seems like a decent changing pad. Update - I checked with the company and all of their items are greenguard certified!
customer_reviews.author: Jem

customer_reviews.title: Our baby likes it.
customer_reviews.text: It is well cushioned, simple, and lightweight, Our baby seems very comfortable on it and seems to like it. It's held up well even when our baby's pee soaks through the changing pad cover/liners.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this changing pad. Comfy, plastic does not separate from pad or make crinkly noise.
customer_reviews.author: melimm

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a memory foam changing pad. It does not fit into the smaller sized changing stations, but luckily is maliable enough to be forced into fitting (if you can't tell I have a smaller changing table). This item comes with a seat belt to keep your rolly polly locked into the changing pad, feels like a memory foam, and will definately be water proof. I would still recommend buying a water proof liner for it (Summer Infant makes some nice cheap ones). I can easily see why this is the best selling changing pad on Amazon...great price and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: C James

customer_reviews.title: Short lasting
customer_reviews.text: Started to tear in the middle after 9 months. Looking for a waterproof cover to avoid buying another pad.
customer_reviews.author: doris

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Worth the extra money! We bought a summer infant pad also and there is no comparison! This one is so much better, more quality material, thicker padding and just an overall better product!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly what you think it would be. I ...
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what you think it would be. I wish it had rubber grippers on the bottom. That would make it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: AWL

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cover.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Finally, a changing pad with a sturdy, cleanable, cover. Smooth surface for easy disinfection.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbur60

customer_reviews.title: I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. Is cushioned and has straps for safety. I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jillene L.

customer_reviews.title: ... months and it has held up it's shape and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for 5 months and it has held up it's shape and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: LorraineFMTX

customer_reviews.title: Barely Used - Tearing at Seams!
customer_reviews.text: Used for 3 months and it’s already tearing apart - invest in something better!
customer_reviews.author: Syed M.

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Works.
customer_reviews.text: It's great. Simple. Works. Bought a second one to replace the first after about a year and a half of use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item because I wanted a contoured changing pad for my son's changing table. It is contoured, and it is a pad, but I wouldn't recommend it for a changing table. First off, it is huge, (we thought maybe it was meant for a terribly un-safe cradle mattress, because it would fit in there perfectly) so it doesn't fit on the changing table. Second, it is kind of flimsy - a squishy kind of soft - when I was looking for something with more support for wiggly baby. Finally, the cover has a texture that doesn't bode well for easy clean-up. I am sure this is the perfect product for somebody, just not for us.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Leroux

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. My little one loves to hang out on it, and fits perfectly on the dresser. It doesn't have any chemical or plastic odor.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Good quality and easy to wipe for anything that goes through the changing pad cover. Would recommend to anyone. Contour helps craddle squirmy little ones.
customer_reviews.author: CSM

customer_reviews.title: Pad got a hole on the cover within 10 months of use
customer_reviews.text: This changing pad was perfect for the first 9 months! Its plastic cover made it so easy to wipe away any messes that come with baby. It is marketed as superior quality, made in the US etc but the cover actually got a hole 10 months in that gathers poop and pee and makes it so difficult to clean. I thought it was supposed to last way longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Ramzito

customer_reviews.title: Made with polyurethane and the description made it seem as ...
customer_reviews.text: Made with polyurethane and the description made it seem as though it wouldn't be and its 1 inch longer than standard size changing pad. Bought a different organic one instead.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

product_meta.title: 2-Sided Contour Changing Pad by Colgate Mattress | Easy to Clean | Hypoallergenic
product_meta.description: Style:2-SidedThe 2-Sided Contour Changing Pad by Colgate Mattress provides a secure cocoon for baby during diaper changes. The quilted, waterproof cover cleans easily and the pad includes a fiber support board, safety strap, and screws. Firm foam ridges on both sides provide a safe, comfortable surface for your baby while being changed. The changing pad’s white, quilted cover cleans easily with a damp cloth and mild soap. All Colgate Mattress crib mattresses, pads, and accessories are non-toxic and pass all government safety standards and manufactured right here in the USA.
feature_bullets: SAFE: Greenguard Gold and CertiPUR-US certified safe for no harmful chemicals or emissions
DURABLE: Non-scratch, non-moisture absorbing bottom that protects furniture
EASY TO CLEAN: Clean the waterproof cover with damp cloth and mild soap
MEASUREMENTS: 16" x 33" x 4"; Designed to fit most standard American changing tables; Please make sure to measure your changing table before placing your order
MADE IN AMERICA: Made by Colgate Mattress, The Crib Mattress Specialist for over 65 years

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars146 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
